title: How Great Thou Art

author.name: Carl Boberg
author.bio: Carl Boberg was a Swedish poet and lay minister. He is best known for writing the original Swedish text of the hymn 'O Store Gud,' which later became known in English as 'How Great Thou Art,' one of the most beloved hymns in the Christian tradition.

lyrics:
1 O Lord my God,
When I in awesome wonder,
Consider all the world
Thy hands have made,
I see the stars,
I hear the rolling thunder
Thy powâ€™r throughout
The universe displayed

Chorus:
Then sings my soul
My Saviour God to Thee
How great Thou art
How great Thou art
Then sings my soul
My Saviour God to Thee
How great Thou art
How great Thou art

2 And when I think that God,
His Son not sparing
Sent Him to die,
I scarce can take it in,
That on the cross,
My burdens gladly bearing
He bled and died
To take away my sin.

3 When Christ shall come
With shouts of acclamation
To take me home,
What joy shall fill my heart
Then I shall bow
In humble adoration,
And there proclaim
My God how great Thou art
